name: The Legend of Plank
description:
You are Sentient piece of wood on a path of destruction across the island!

Face off against plant monsters and duke it out until only you remain!

Stab with your leaf dagger or blow the enemy to smithereens with your tomato bombs!

Keyboard Controls:

W: Up

A: Left

S: Down

D: Right

Enter: Pause

Space: Ability Select Toggle

Keypad 1: Attack or interact 

Keypad 3: Use Item

Xbox or PlayStation Controller:

Up Pad: Up

Left Pad: Left

Down Pad: Down

Right Pad: Right

Start: Pause

Select: Ability Select Toggle

A(Xbox) or X(PlayStation): Attack or interact 

B(Xbox) or O(PlayStation): Keypad 3: Use Item
